name: ActionDiving
description:
Made for a Game Jam. will possibly polish it up and do a full release.

Use your phones Gyro to spin an Action Hero

so far two working characters
to correctly dive aim character directly down and slow rotation to 0

i will continue to work on this and fix in future.
was hoping to add scores and even enemy's to take down while you fall.

apologies for the size.  didn't get time to shrink it.
